channel.title: 95 Solves on ByteTheCookies
channel.description: Recent content in 95 Solves on ByteTheCookies

item.title: GoSecureIt
item.description: GoSecureIt Description: I’ve found this website under construction, at the moment you can only register, but I think there’s something strange in the cookie Introduction We are faced with an application written in go, not very complex with several files, but already looking at the folder tree we see the secret folder with secret.go inside and this code Source // filename: secret.go package secret var JwtSecretKey = []byte("schrody_is_always_watching") // I don't know why it's called secret, I'll just leave it here :) Obviously this is the cookie secret, but interacting with the web application there is not much to do, so it is worth checking other files, especially in Golang, when using the Gin framework it is often used to define routes in the main.
